title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 451.2 - First annual report of pharmacy benefit managers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 451.2 - First annual report of pharmacy benefit managers

State Regulations

Each pharmacy benefit manager shall electronically file a first annual report with the department pursuant to Insurance Law section 2904 no later than July 1, 2022 on a form and in a manner prescribed by the superintendent. The exemption provided for in 11 NYCRR
6.3
shall apply to this annual report as if this filing were listed in 11 NYCRR
6.2
(a). Notes

ยง
451.2

Adopted

New

York State Register August 31, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 35, eff. 8/31/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
